thread.title: Luxy to Donate All Proceeds of White Roses to Wild Animal Conservation
thread.title_full: Luxy to Donate All Proceeds of White Roses to Wild Animal Conservation - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Luxy to Donate All Proceeds of White Roses to Wild Animal Conservation
text:
Luxy
Luxy To Take Initiative on World Animal Day
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- To commemorate World Animal Day on October 4 th 2015, Luxy will be releasing rare edition white roses that clientele can give to their romantic partner(s). All proceeds of these white roses will be given to the World Wildlife Foundation (WWF) to help in the preservation of wild animals and their habitats around the world.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151006/274360
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151006/274359
Luxy CEO Tim T had this to say about the announcement:
Biodiversity is a beautiful thing, unfortunately as humans we do not always take the time to appreciate and preserve what we have. Our use of resources through direct and indirect have begun to disturb wild life, even depleting some species to near extinction. As a company specializing in finding love with rich millionaires, Luxy thought we'd help spread the love by introducing white roses on October 7 th . The goal is to take the money generated and send it off to the World Wildlife Foundation. The benefit for our clientele is that they have the money to spend on a good cause, and can give their romantic other an exclusive Luxy gift to be remembered by. White roses will labeled in the new Luxy "rarer list" and only be available for a limited time. This is a win-win for both parties. As a company we feel ecstatic to be facilitating real and positive change.
Luxy expects to make a large donation to the World Wild Life Foundation after October 7 th , recent polls to the apps users had found that they were appalled with current animal hunting laws. Over 62% of users voted that the laws made them sick, 21% didn't mind, and 17% left no comment. By donating to the World Wildlife Foundation Luxy will help the majority of users who dislike current treatment of animals in the wild. Money raised by the white rose drive will be announced in the Moments, and on the Luxy Facebook and Twitter pages.
If you would like more information about this Luxy or would like to download the millionaire dating app to purchase your own white rose, please go to www.onluxy.com or email the company at partners@onluxy.com . The Luxy app is available on both the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store for Android users.
Media contact:
CEO, Tim T.
Email
(503) 928-7482
